evidence.claim: Betterview utilizes AWS for cloud infrastructure, ensuring scalable solutions for their platform.
Betterview ensures compliance with HIPAA standards in handling health-related data.
The company implements HL7 standards for data interoperability within healthcare applications.
Betterview employs Snowflake for data warehousing, facilitating advanced analytics and data analysis capabilities.
They utilize Kafka for real-time data streaming and processing, enhancing data integration within their systems.

icp.icp_reason: No evidence found of involvement with X12 transactions or EDI use cases.
